Text:
It looks like the improvements for the planned
construction site are coming together.
...Well then, if you could fill me in on the report.

I've completed a full background check on the old
lady "Luna."

She's completely clean. No connections whatsoever to
the Cult of Diablos.
But I've also uncovered a little a secret.
A secret...?

As company president, Luna didn't use her money to
cover the fact that her granddaughter was possessed.

Because of this, the other companies attacked and
ousted her, ultimately driving Luna and her family
to their deaths.
What?!

So...that old lady is a total stranger who inherited
the name "Luna" from the actual Luna?

That's right. She was an employee who inherited the
company from Luna before her death.

Despite not having any blood relation or personal
stake in the company, the old lady maintained
Luna, Ltd. as Luna's double for ten years.

Not that it matters who ran the company so long as
the shares were genuine,

but I understand better why the old lady gave away
her company shares to a total stranger like me.

The truth about why Luna did not attempt to hide the
existence of her possessed granddaughter remains
unknown.
She left no records, and the dead tell no tales.

About that, maybe the original Luna didn't want to
erase the existence of her own granddaughter.

Perhaps the old lady understood this, and that's why
she decided to take on the company as the new Luna...
At least that's what I'd like to think.

So how will you deal with this? Will you speak about
it with her?
...No, that won't be necessary.

We'll soon be running the company under a new
business model and name.

And, besides, that old lady Luna...likely doesn't have
much longer to live.

If she wants to take her secrets to the grave, I'll
respect her wishes and treat her as I would the
real Luna until her last breath.
...You're surprisingly sentimental, Gamma.
Really? I personally consider myself rather brazen.

After all, I'm attempting to run a business as an
imposter who's inherited her name from another
imposter.

I intend to fulfill my fundamental duties as a
businesswoman

Maintain my customers' secrets and avoid uncovering
those secrets unnecessarily.
Very well. I'll let Lady Alpha know. See you around.

...Although the world denies them as possessed, they
still choose to be part of this world.

Yet they do not wish to pick up the sword and
fight...

...Part of my work in the Shadow Garden is to be a
vehicle for such people to reinvent themselves.

Maybe it wasn't a coincidence that the Garden
acquired Luna, Ltd.

According to Shadow Wisdom, a store's location is
ninety percent of the battle! And this here is the
heart of the city where we have access to both the
commoners and the wealthy.

I've developed a vast aristocrat client base through
parties and salons, a supply network linking province
and capital well-versed in fashion and tea trade, and
an understanding of the middle class via Tuna King.

To best utilize the strengths of Luna, Ltd. developed
over the years...

I will establish a commercial complex that will
include a clothing department, a food and tea
department, and the first permanent Tuna King
restaurant.

Luna, Ltd. will be reborn as the commercial center's
managing body to integrate and coordinate these
various elements. It will not only be unparalleled in
the Midgar Kingdom, but the entire world!
Alright! It's showtime! I'm gonna give it my all
...I've got thiiiis!
